RT @rangerstaxcase: Let there be no spinning or euphemisms. The Supreme Court has ruled Rangers FC engaged in an illegal tax scheme 2002-20â€¦
Feels good to finally see them outed as the cheating bastards we always knew they were #StripTheTitles
RT @alextomo: The scale of Rangers' cheating: Â£48m paid to 80 people over 10 years to unfairly win 14 trophies
RT @alextomo: 10 years of cheating the taxman to 14 trophies and all in the watch of Stewart Regan and Neil Doncaster at SFA/SPFL
RT @alextomo: This now means that Rangers cheated their way to 14 trophies: they cheated the taxman, they cheated us all.
RT @paddypower: Sod it - we're paying out on Celtic winning next season's Scottish Premiership title. #YouBeauty
RT @paddypower: This is the most embarrassing night for Rangers football club since they stopped being Rangers football club.
